T02D2374:10a-1: rnam rtog 'jig pa'i chom rkun 'jigs shes na //
T02D2374:10a-2: tshul khrims nor chen bsrung phyir me la tshe gyis //
T02D2374:10a-3: kye snyom las ma byed sems kyi me la tshe gyis //
T02D2374:10a-4: gti mug gnyid kyis 'khor pa'i mtshan mo ring //
T02D2374:10a-5: kye snyom las ma byed sems kyi mel tshe gyis //
T02D2374:10a-6: gnyid log na ni khyim nang chom rkun 'gro //
T02D2374:10a-7: khyod kyi tshul khrims nor chen 'phrog par 'gyur //
T02D2374:10a-8: tshul khrims nor de med na ting 'dzin med //
T02D2374:10b-0: de med na ni @10b nyi ma 'char ba med //
T02D2374:10b-1: de nyid nyi ma bsgom pas mi la tshe gyis //
T02D2374:10b-2: skad cig gcig kyang nor chung gzhan ma byed //
T02D2374:10b-3: de yi dus na de nyid nya ma 'char //
T02D2374:10b-4: 'di ltar de tshe 'khor ba'i nam langs 'gyur /
T02D2374:10b-5: kye snyom las ma byed sems kyi me la tshe gyis //
